message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll try to counter!
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up too much
You're not giving up enough, I'm willing to take more risk
I'm willing to take a slightly bigger hit, but I'm not giving up too much more
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control now
I'm running out of options, but I'm not giving up yet
You're getting close to the edge, but I'm not going to let you have it all
I'm making one last stand, meet me in the middle or it's all or nothing
You're out of options, I'm taking the last shot
I'm not giving up, I'll take the last chance to make a deal
It's all or nothing, take it or leave it
